name: Infocom EasyFlash Collection V3.2
overview: A new collector's Easyflash release for the C64 and C64C. Enjoy all the adventuring without all the disk swapping. Contains these classic Infocom text adventure games: • Planetfall • Stationfall • Starcross • Suspended • Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy • Leather Goddesses of Phobos • Seastalker • Wishbringer
